column4: im having trouble installing flash 10 in ubuntu 8.04. ive tried the tar file, the deb...no luck, it will say it installs and will even list itself as installed such as synaptic, but no flash, and in firefox it doesnt list it in about:plugins....im considering going back to 9, but I can't find a link for that package
gnash mixed experiences...adobe 9 may be the answer
